segments.text: This is a very beautiful statue . What's it called ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's called ' Endless Love ' . It was a gift from a sister city in Australia for the 100th anniversary of the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just two months ago . There were very big celebrations and there was a spectacular fireworks display . I took part in the great parade myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds real good . It's a pity that I missed that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We all loved the celebration of our city's birthday . It made the people feel so proud of our city .
segments.speaker: S2
